title: Bobby And Caitlin Talk Wedding Fashion + Craig Morgan Stops By The Studio For Veterans Day + Lunchbox Asks Carly Pearce An Inappropriate Question
itunes:title: Bobby And Caitlin Talk Wedding Fashion + Craig Morgan Stops By The Studio For Veterans Day + Lunchbox Asks Carly Pearce An Inappropriate Question
description:
Bobby and his fiancé Caitlin came by the show to see Craig Morgan perform, but before he came in, the two of them openly talked up their upcoming wedding and their fashion details. Craig Morgan stops by and talks about his time in the military and performs for us! Plus, the show brings in their interviews from the CMA Awards!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
